```php
<?php

namespace App\Jobs;

use App\Models\Merchant;
use App\Models\Application;
use Illuminate\Bus\Queueable;
use Illuminate\Queue\SerializesModels;
use Illuminate\Queue\InteractsWithQueue;
use Illuminate\Contracts\Queue\ShouldQueue;
use Illuminate\Foundation\Bus\Dispatchable;
use App\Notifications\MerchantBoardingNotification;

class MerchantBoardingJob implements ShouldQueue
{
    use Dispatchable, InteractsWithQueue, Queueable, SerializesModels;

    /** @var Application */
    protected $application;

    protected $files;

    /**
     * Create a new job instance.
     *
     * @return void
     */
    public function __construct(Application $application, $files = [])
    {
        $this->application = $application;
        $this->files = $files;
    }

    /**
     * Execute the job.
     *
     * @return void
     */
    public function handle()
    {
        //
        $application = $this->application;

        $merchant = Merchant::where('mid', $application->mid)
            ->orWhere('agent_mid', $application->mid)
            ->first();
        if ($merchant === null) {
            return;
        }

        $wasBoarded = $merchant->isBoarded();

        $merchant->board($application, $this->files);

        if (! $wasBoarded && $merchant->isBoarded()) {
            $merchant->notify(new MerchantBoardingNotification($application));
        }
    }
}
```

```php
class Braintree_Customer extends Braintree
{
	....
	....

    // static methods redirecting to gateway

    public static function all()
    {
        return self::_doGet("/customers");
    }

    public static function fetch($query, $ids)
    {
        return self::_doFetch("/customers/advanced_search", $query, $ids);
    }

    public static function search($query)
    {
        return self::_doSearch("/customers/advanced_search_ids", $query);
    }

    /**
     * Creates a customer using the given +attributes+.
     *
     * If +id+ is not provided, it will be generated by the gateway.  The
     * generated ID will uaually be a random 6-character string, and may not be
     * the same as previous IDs generated by the gateway.
     *
     * <code id="yp297i2qIi" data-rand="PTuLEqKton">
     *   $result = Customer::create(array(
     *     'first_name' => 'Mike',
     *     'last_name' => 'Jones',
     *     'email' => 'mike.jones@example.com',
     *     'credit_card' => array(
     *       'number' => '41111111111111111',
     *       'expiration_date' => '05/2009'
     *     )
     *   ));
     *   if($result->success) {
     *     echo 'Created customer ' . $result->customer->id;
     *   } else {
     *     echo 'Could not create customer, see result->errors';
     *   }
     * </code>
     *
     * @access public
     * @param array $attribs
     * @return object Result, either Successful or Error
     */
    public static function create($attribs = array())
    {
        self::_validateId($attribs);
        return self::_doCreate('/customers', array('customer' => $attribs));
    }

    /**
     * creates a customer, and retries the create on duplicate customer records
     *
     * @access public
     * @param array $attribs
     * @return object Result
     * @throws Braintree_Exception_ServerError
     */
    public static function createNoValidate($attribs = array())
    {
        $result = self::create($attribs);
        if ($result instanceof Braintree_Result_Error) {
           throw new Braintree_Exception_ServerError("customer creation failed, servers are down");
        }
        else {
          return $result;
        }

    }

    /**
     * attempts to create the customer, and throws an exception on failure
     *
     * @access public
     * @param array $attribs
     * @return object Customer
     * @throws Braintree_Exception_ValidationsFailed
     */
    public static function createOrFail($attribs = array())
    {
        $result = self::create($attribs);
        return self::_verifyGatewayResponse($result);
    }
    /**
     *
     * @access protected
     */
    protected function __construct()
    {

    }
}
```

```
SkyTab Marketplace
The SkyTab Marketplace is the evolution of the Lighthouse Marketplace. It is NOT a customer-facing app store concept.

The Marketplace represents all of Shift4's many different integrations (i.e. POS, PMS, eComm, etc.), a central place to download software from third-party vendors, and a place for resellers to differentiate their offering, customize software installation, and manage apps.
```
